## Summary

(Short summary of the epic)

## Goals

- Implement automatic and manual time tracking for projects.
- Provide admin controls and reporting.
- Ensure WCAG 2.2 AA accessibility.

## Current Implementation

(Reference relevant files and endpoints)

## Gaps / Next Steps

- Standalone timers
- Admin active timers UI
- Rate snapshotting and billing
- Manual entry modal
- Accessibility validation

## Acceptance Criteria

- Contractors can track time and view their own entries.
- Admins can manage all entries and control timers.
- UI and interactions meet WCAG 2.2 AA.
